pageContext.description: Made of rather thin metal. The ribs round socket are not very prominent. Sharp edges. Remains of wooden shaft.
pageContext.patina: Slight traces of darker patina. Purplish patches on lip of socket.
pageContext.surface: Light greenish brown, encrusted. Rather rough.
pageContext.other: Width: blade 32mm; socket 23mm,Thickness: blade 15mm; socket 23mm,Weight: 92.13 gms
pageContext.associations: Hoard SE of Wrekin. 4 other spearheads and part leaf-shaped sword. (Part of the hoard)
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1926,3,Lord Forester,Willey Park, Broseley, Salop.
pageContext.site: England,Shropshire,Little Wenlock,Willow Moor,1834 (spring),in a marshy field
pageContext.toSearch: Little Wenlock, Telford, Telford And Wrekin Tf6, UK
